content: W: Have you decided on your college major yet? M: Not yet. I'm considering either biology or English literature. Both are fascinating to me.

analysis.details: W: Have you decided on your college major yet? (你已经决定你的大学专业了吗？) M: Not yet. I'm considering either biology or English literature. (还没有。我正在考虑生物学或英国文学。) 由此可知，男士正在考虑选择两个大学专业中的一个。
